data.persona: I am usually small, and always covered in scales. My blood is cold, so I always try to stay warm. Green is the most common lizard tone, but we come in many colors.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the fairy temple.
The fairy temple is very small.  No human has ever been in there, but there was a fairy interpreter that described it as covered in green leaves and grass.  He said they told him that there is a giant frog in the middle that eats all of the pesky flies.
There's a flower, a grass, a scarab beetle, and a leaf here.
The fly and the giant frog are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to prove to all my lizard friends that I've been inside the fairy temple.
data.mid_motivation: I want to show all my lizard friends where the fairy temple is.
data.long_motivation: I want to steal the powers of the fairy temple and give them to my fellow lizards, so that we can overthrow the fairies and take over the forest.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: hit the fly to distract the frog and the scarab beetle.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: hit the frog when its back is turned.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal a magical fire flower from the fairy interpreter who is charged with guarding the magical flowerbeds inside the fairy temple.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the domain of the lizards and show the lizards the fire flower, proving that the fairy temple is accessible.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go the fairy temple with an army of lizards to overthrow the fairies and take over the forest.
